abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in TCP/IP-based internets. In particular, it defines Traps for managing version 3 of the Open Shortest Path First Routing Protocol. Version 3 of the OSPF protocol is specific to the IPv6 address family. This memo is intended to complement draft-ietf-ospf-ospfv3-mib-09.txt and uses many definitions provided in this MIB.
